title: player perposefully afks from RANKED game,then buys items at level 1 and states ggwp at lobby

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: player afks purposefully in a ranked game, buys items while at level 1 and then states "ggwp" at end of game lobby. please note that this was in a ranked game.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

Reporting other players on the boards is not allowed. You should instead create a support ticket.

We can't punish people, hence they only thing we can do is witch-hunt, which leads to dire consequences.
